document_data.name: Tabards
document_data.mainbody: The '''Tabards''' were the highly competent military forces that patrolled [[Gontal City]].{{Cite dragon/366/Gontal|52}}
document_data.Activities: The Tabards were in charge of patrolling Gontal City. They were renowned for their discipline, skill, and loyalty to the ruler of [[Gontal]].
document_data.Possessions: The Tabards wore distinctive black armors.
